text: @senatemajldr Americans don’t need liability protection for corporations (shouldn’t be needed anyway if we had better testing and contact tracing regimen), military dollars and a new FBI building.  Blaming democrats is deflection.  This should and has to be a bipartisan focus on coronavirus
